titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow individuals a deduction of up to $100 for contributions made to candidates for public office.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 1/21/1993--Introduced. Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow individuals a tax deduction of up to $100 ($200 in the case of a joint return) for political contributions.
